Package controller

Class ProductScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.ProductScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ProductScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that controls the logic of the product screen of the application.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rifatul Karim

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductScreenController

      public ProductScreenController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initiated upon calling this controller when selecting to modify/add product from the main screen. This class requires to initializes the table column for the both tables and also will disable the ability the edit data of the id field which will auto generated by the program. Afterwards, it populates the table views with availiable parts from inventory and parts of the product.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • addPart_ButtonHandler

      public void addPart_ButtonHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Adds the selected part to the product.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - add Part click handler

    • removePart_ButtonHandler

      public void removePart_ButtonHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Remove the selected part from the product.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - remove Part click handler

    • saveData_ButtonHandler

      public void saveData_ButtonHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Functions to save the new or modified product data to the inventory. Check the data validity and prints out error if present otherwise takes user to the main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - save Data click handler

    • checkDataValidity

      private boolean checkDataValidity()
      Checks all the data inputs in the textfield and see if they are in right format and follows the rule. Afterwards it will print out for each errors into the same screen otherwise returns false.
      Returns:
      returns true if there are error found.

    • cancelAction

      public void cancelAction​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Takes the user to the main screen. Throws IOException if it cannot locate MainScreen.fxml
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - cancel Action

    • loadSelectedProductData

      public void loadSelectedProductData​(Product selectedProduct)
      loads the data to modify selected from the main screen to the product screen
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - loads the selected data from the product table of the main screen

    • partSearch_keyPressedHandler

      public void partSearch_keyPressedHandler​(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Checks if the textfield of the part search is empty then it will refresh the table to the original state.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - search part on key pressed handler

    • searchPart_ClickHandler

      public void searchPart_ClickHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      The program looks up for the parts by id or name that partially matches and load them into the table. The table will be refreshed to the original state if the textfield is empty.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - Part search button action.

    • removeErrorLabels

      private void removeErrorLabels()
      Removes all the error messages on the screen.
